Factors Affecting General Health

Approximately 25% of our overall health depends from genetics and 75% from our daily lifestyle. The Mobile Health Station and Health Portal is intended to allow users manage daily lifestyle, control their own basic health parameters, obtain accurate health reports and provide them with detailed health status information.

Doctor Benefits

Treat own patients anywhere, anytime

Remote health care

Remote access to electronic personal health records helps doctors to accelerate diagnosis and treatment, provide highest levels of remote health care, reduce inefficiencies, administrative costs and ultimately offering better, faster care.

Increasing the effectiveness

Increase the number of patients who can be treated during a given period of time and increase effectiveness of treatment.

New streams of revenue

Provide new streams of revenue in the form of virtual consultations and assessments.

Our Mission Through this platform

Train people to a healthy lifestyle

Self-manage own health and daily lifestyle

Help people to extend healthy life expectancy

To help doctors provide independent remote medical assistance

Supported Parameters

On the Mobile Health Station, after user identification, up to 44 parametres can be measured in only 6 minutes. The results are automatically recorded in the user’s account in the portal and provided immediately via E-mail and SMS.

Cardiovascular system

Blood glucose

Complote Blood count

Body analysis

Others
